verses.verse: Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Begotten; <S%G1080><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> Him That <S%G3588><s%> Begat, <S%G1080><s%> <S%G25><s%> <S%G25><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Him That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Begotten <S%G1080><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Love <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> We Love <S%G25><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> Keep. <S%G5083><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> For This <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> We Should Keep; <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> Burdensome <S%G926><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not. <S%G1526><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Begotten <S%G1080><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Overcomes <S%G3528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World; <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Victory <S%G3529><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Overcame <S%G3528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Our Faith. <S%G2257><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Overcomes <S%G3528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Only, <S%G3440><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Blood. <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Bears Witness, <S%G3140><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth. <S%G225><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Bear Witness <S%G3140><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Father, <S%G3962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost; <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> There Are <S%G1526><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Bear Witness <S%G3140><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Earth, <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Water, <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood; <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> One Point <S%G1520><s%> Are. <S%G1526><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3141><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> We Receive, <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3141><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3141><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Has Witnessed <S%G3140><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son. <S%G846><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Believes <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3141><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Himself; <S%G1438><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Believes Not <S%G4100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> A Liar <S%G5583><s%> Has Made <S%G4160><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Has Not Believed <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Witness <S%G3141><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Has Witnessed <S%G3140><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son. <S%G846><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Eternal, <S%G166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Believe <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of God <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> We May Ask <S%G154><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> His Will, <S%G846><s%> He Hears <S%G191><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Hears <S%G191><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> We May Ask, <S%G154><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Requests <S%G155><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Have Asked <S%G154><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should See <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> Sinning <S%G264><s%> A Sin <S%G266><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> He Shall Ask, <S%G154><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Give <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> For Those That <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G264><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> A Sin <S%G266><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Death; <S%G2288><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> Do I Say <S%G3004><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Beseech. <S%G2065><s%>
Every <S%G3956><s%> Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Is <S%G2076><s%> A Sin <S%G266><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Anyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Begotten <S%G1080><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Sins, <S%G264><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Was Begotten <S%G1080><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> , Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One <S%G4190><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Touch <S%G680><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> We Are, <S%G2070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One <S%G4190><s%> Lies. <S%G2749><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And We Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Is Come, <S%G2240><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Has Given <S%G1325><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> An Understanding <S%G1271><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Might Know <S%G1097><s%> Him That Is <S%G3588><s%> True; <S%G228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him That Is <S%G3588><s%> True, <S%G228><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> His Son <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>
Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> Keep <S%G5442><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Idols. <S%G1497><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
